evidence.claim: Sunrise ABA utilizes Amazon S3 for secure data storage compliant with HIPAA standards.
The company implements FHIR APIs for health data exchange between systems.
Integration with third-party EHRs via RESTful APIs is a key feature.
They leverage AWS Lambda for serverless application components processing healthcare data.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found of handling X12 or related data exchange use cases.
